def_en: You use fixed to describe something which stays the same and does not or cannot vary.

def_cn: (观念或看法)顽固的，固执的，一成不变的
def_en: If you say that someone has fixed ideas or opinions, you mean that they do not often change their ideas and opinions, although perhaps they should.

def_cn: (笑容)僵硬的，呆板的,皮笑肉不笑的
def_en: If someone has a fixed smile on their face, they are smiling even though they do not feel happy or pleased.

def_cn: 无固定住所的;居无定所的
def_en: See also:fix; Someone who is of no fixed address, or in British English no fixed abode, does not have a permanent place to live.
